scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run flask"
scripts.flask: cd neural_network && cross-env FLASK_APP=app.py PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 python -m flask run
scripts.flask:dev: cd neural_network && cross-env FLASK_APP=app.py FLASK_ENV=development PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 python -m flask run
